DataElement.preferredName: Primary Cytotoxic Chemotherapy Or Maintenance Therapy Bevacizumab Progressive Disease Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date of disease progression for a patient on either frontline or maintenance Bevacizumab.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Cytotoxic Chemotherapy Or Maintenance Therapy Bevacizumab Progressive Disease Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._A monoclonal antibody that may prevent the growth of blood vessels from surrounding tissue to a solid tumor._Anticancer drugs that kill cells, especially cancer cells._Cancer that is growing, spreading, or getting worse._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Primary Cytotoxic Chemotherapy Or Maintenance Therapy Bevacizumab
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.:Anticancer drugs that kill cells, especially cancer cells.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Treatment that is given to help a primary (original) treatment keep working. Maintenance therapy is often given to help keep cancer in remission.:A monoclonal antibody that may prevent the growth of blood vessels from surrounding tissue to a solid tumor.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.
A drug therapy that is used to destroy cancer cells.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.

A recombinant humanized monoclonal antibody directed against the vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF), a pro-angiogenic cytokine.  Bevacizumab binds to VEGF and inhibits VEGF receptor binding, thereby preventing the growth and maintenance of tumor blood vessels.

Property.preferredDefinition: Cancer that is growing, spreading, or getting worse.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Cancer that is growing, spreading, or getting worse.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.
